titles.title: To amend part E of title IV of the Social Security Act to require States to provide for the placement of a foster child in a cottage home, and to make a child so placed eligible for foster care maintenance payments.
Caring Homes and Improved Lives for Dependents (CHILD) Act
Caring Homes and Improved Lives for Dependents (CHILD) Act
Caring Homes and Improved Lives for Dependents (CHILD) Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
